portfolio.title: Product Reccomendation
portfolio.description: Created e-commerce web and mobile platforms, integrating Recommendation Engine trained based on collaborative filtering and graph neural networks to offer personalized product recommendations based on user activity and purchase history.

portfolio.title: Face Verification
portfolio.description: Designed a naive Face verification system by extracting features with CNNs from the Inception model trained on the ImageNet dataset and computing triplet loss distance.

portfolio.title: American Sign Language Detection
portfolio.description: American Sign Language (ASL) detection system using the ResNet50 neural network architecture. The system aims to recognize and classify hand gestures from video sequences, enabling real-time communication and interaction for individuals with hearing impairments.

portfolio.title: Code Judge
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented an efficient grading system that precisely evaluated student performance, offering tailored solutions for each problem. Additionally, I optimized the enrollment process by incorporating an access code system, simplified navigation through questions with tagging functionality, and enhanced instructor efficiency with a bulk upload feature for test cases. The system also generated comprehensive statistics, aiding instructors in evaluating class performance and pinpointing areas for improvement.
